summary:
Buffalo wings are a popular American food. They are deep-fried chicken wing sections coated in a spicy sauce made from hot sauce and butter. The wings are usually served with celery and carrot sticks, and a blue cheese or ranch dressing dip. Despite the name, they have nothing to do with the animal buffalo and originated in Buffalo, New York.

These wings have become a favorite in many restaurants and are often simply called "chicken wings" or "hot wings." The term "Buffalo" is now also used for other spicy fried foods served with sauces.
title: Buffalo wing
